--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> As things calmed down, Wildrider looked like he was having problems
> contemplating things going on, he moved out of the way of 
everything,
> and sat down near Astrotrain, head in his hands, deep in thought.

::Blindchaos and Domnijoe::

    Blindchaos's smile faded briefly then returned, this time less 
candied. He looked at Cyclonus, shrugged, and made his way to 
Astrotrain. He leaned up against the triplechanger with his arms 
crossed. He studied Wildrider intently. He did not speak to the 
Decepticon, preferring to leave him to his own thoughts.
    Meanwhile, Domnijoe had patiently left Cyclonus's side to give
the 
fallen ship a hearty kick.
    "Now that I'm rid of you." she snapped at it, "I can melt you 
down!" She began throwing rocks at it. "Rip you apart for salvage!" A 
colorful stream of obsenaties broke loose from her lips. "And damn
the 
Maximal scrap that welded you together!"

Northight
Domnijoe Productions

OOC: I got a kick out of Dom's action...Go Fig.
